lines.text: [he tries to run after her, John restrains him]
You may not care about her safety...

[rounding on him]
Don't you dare tell me I don't care about her!
Well, you didn't say, "Thank you," either. Whatever happened to manners and etiquette?
Well, since you are new here I don't expect you to have them yet.

[comes out of her room wearing panties and blouse]
How do I look?

[looks down]
Lovely... in your underwear. Didn't Mrs. Jenkins...? Mrs. Jenkins!
Oh! I'll put on lots and lots of tea.
The Jenkins have been serving the Rolfe family for centuries. Careful, she's about to put on some tea.
